action_description: De provincie Limburg organiseert een samenaankoop voor de levering van aardgas en elektriciteit voor alle Limburgse gemeentebesturen. In het contract wordt voorzien dat er 100% groene stroom wordt geleverd. Door deel te nemen aan deze samenaankoop kunnen gemeentebesturen aan gunstigere voorwaarden voorzien in de energiebehoefte van hun gemeentebestuur.
name: Hamont-Achel

action_description: Het treinstation in Hamont-Achel is opnieuw geopend. Hiervoor is het station en perron opnieuw aangelegd door de NMBS. Evenals een nieuwe fietsenstalling is door de gemeente Hamont-Achel aangelegd alsook de beplanting is door de stad gefinancierd.
name: Hamont-Achel

action_description: Genom installation av nya styr och reglersystem samt injusteringar kan mycket energi sparas. Prioritering sker efter byggnadens energianvändning, ålder på systemen och andra planerade åtgärder.
name: Haninge

action_description: Genom att byta ut uppvärmningssystemen i kommunens lokaler minskar energianvändningen och koldioxid utsläppen. Utbytet sker successivt och byggnader med en hög energianvändning och behov av andra renoverings åtgärder prioriteras.
name: Haninge

action_description:
Målet med samordnad varudistribution är att ändra transportsystemet inom och till kommunen och med det minska det totala antalet transporter. 
Syftet är att få till stånd en rad miljöförbättringar, där färre transporter innebär reducering av koldioxid, kvävedioxider och partiklar. En rad andra positiva effekter tillkommer också, t ex att reducerat antal transporter medför positiva effekter på hälsan. Vidare innebär färre transporter i känsliga områden en ökad trafiksäkerhet. Färre transporter medför också mindre slitage på vägarna. Arbetsmiljön bör kunna förbättras med färre varutransporter med färre antal avbrott i arbetet för mottagning av leveranser och dessutom kommer olika tillval att inkluderas som önskemål i upphandlingen för att underlätta hanteringen av tunga varor. Vad gäller ekonomin så uppskattas införandet av samordnad varudistribution minska kostnaderna med 2-3 %.
name: Haninge

action_description:
A unique
and advanced project started in Hannover. One of the biggest and most
innovative, zero emission, climate protection developments for around 300
terraced, semi-detached and detached low-energy houses is under construction.
The remaining CO2 emissions for the heating requirements and
household electricity required will be covered by renewable energies. As well
as being energy neutral, the area will provide a very high quality of life with
attractive and generous-sized green spaces and an exemplary water concept.
After its Expo development at Kronsberg, Hannover
is once again setting standards in climate and environmental protection with
its 'zero:e park am Hirtenbach' construction project.
name: Hannover

action_description:
As part of the act2 project, a total of 52 buildings in Hannover (with 398 dwelling units and around 24,000 m² of living space) underwent energy efficiency refurbishment and three
municipal school buildings with together 8.532 m² have been energetically
retrofitted. With an insulation thickness of 14-16 cm for the outer walls and 20 cm for the top-floor ceilings, the statutory requirements for new buildings were either met or exceeded. To complement these insulation measures, conversion to environmentally friendly heating systems (pellet heating and district heating from biomass) took place. The consumption data analysed indicate heat energy savings that, at 50-65 per cent, are far higher than those for buildings refurbished in the usual way. It proved possible to reduce consumption from more than 250 kWh/m²a down to 70-100 kWh/m²a.
name: Hannover

action_description:
Hannover
catches the sunThe city of Hanover started a solar
campaign which was launched to significantly increase the share of renewable
energies in the city. The goal is to install one million square metres of solar
modules by 2020. This is quite a challenge because it means increasing the area
seventeen fold. A solar atlas was published on the internet.
All home owners will be able to look and see whether their homes within the
city’s boundaries are suitable for a solar system. Investors can also draw on
further support offerings free solar checks or the support of a photovoltaic
pilot financed by the proKlima fund. The project is co-financed by Intelligent Energy Europe (IEE) in the frame of the Leadership for Energy Action and Planning (LEAP) project.
name: Hannover

action_description: Elke Limburgse particuliere eigenaar kan tot 10.000 € ontlenen voor verschillende energiebesparende maatregelen (het plaatsen van hoogrendementsglas en bijhorende raamprofielen, het vervangen van verwarmingsinstallaties door een energiezuinige verwarmingsketel, of voor isolatie van een dak, kelder en muren. Ook de installatie van een warmtepomp of zonneboiler is mogelijk). De lening moet worden terugbetaald over 5 jaar, aan een interest van 2%. Voor financieel kwetsbare gezinnen bedraagt de intrest 0%. Duwolim is de organisatie waar je in Limburg voor deze Vlaamse energielening terecht kan. Je krijgt niet alleen een goedkope lening, maar ook een deskundig advies. Duwolim verstrekte al bijna 2000 leningen.
name: Hasselt

action_description: On the city’s nature domain Kiewit 3 separate conventional heating installations are replaced by one central heating installation on biomass (wood pellets). The different boiler rooms are connected through an underground heating network.
name: Hasselt

action_description: De provincie Limburg steunt het Vlaamse initiatief 'Energiescans' dat via Infrax wordt georganiseerd. een professionele adviseur van Stebo komt bij de burgers aan huis en licht de woning door. Hij gaat op zoek naar nutteloos energieverbruik door het gebouw, de thermostaat, de verwarmingsinstallatie, het waterverbruik en de verlichting te bekijken. Hierna kan de 'energiescanner' meteen enkele maatregelen treffen (vb. tochtstrips of spaardouchekop). Tenslotte krijgt de burger advies over mogelijk meer ingrijpende maatregelen. aansluitend kan men begeleiding krijgen bij de uitvoering van deze volgende stappen (o.m. in het kader van een DUWOLIM-lening). een gezin kan zo gemakkelijk 30% besparen op energie en ook veel geld uitsparen.
name: Hasselt

action_description:

Aansluitend kan men begeleiding krijgen bij de uitvoering van deze volgende stappen (o.m.  in het kader van een Duwolim-lening).

name: Heers

action_description: Organisation of promotion campaign for local products 'Taste Heist' . The goal is to encourage civilians to buy locally produced products (wich recuire less kilometers from producer to consumer).
name: Heist-op-den-Berg

action_description: Organisation of sensitizing campaign for staff of municipality and public center for social welfare   'I participate for less carbon' + staff could participate in group purchase for electric bikes
name: Heist-op-den-Berg

action_description: Renovation (and newly built part) of cultural center, replacement of several old heating systems by new efficient systems, insulation of roofs.
name: Heist-op-den-Berg

action_description: The municipal waste treatment company, NSR started their biogas production in 1996. Since then several improvements and extensions have been made. In 2014 the latest addition to the plant was taken into service. The capacity for biogas production had then been doubled ending up at 80 GWh. The biogas is upgraded and used as motor fuel. The digestion residue is used as biofertiliser and is transported by pipelines to the farmers.
name: Helsingborg

action_description: The municipal energy advisor and the municipal environmental inspectors join action visiting  the industry to adress the issue of sustainable energy use. The businesses get advices on actions to lower their energy use and are encouraged to have an energy review made. They may also, on the basis of the environmental code,  be requiered to investigate the possibility to replace fossil fuels or to have an updated energy plan for the business available.
name: Helsingborg

action_description: A high tech project has been carried out in the ice arena of Helsingborg; in several stages during several years. The main objective has been to save energy and the result was an annual saving of 2 200 000 kWh. Other positive results was a better climate for the audience and improved ice quality.
name: Helsingborg

action_description: Viikki Environment House was the first nearly zero energy office building built in Finland. It was completed in 2011. The building has been awarded with several prizes. The design of the building envelope and building service systems are based on maximal energy efficiency. The building is equipped with solar panels on the roof and integrated to facade, ground source cooling and micro wind turbines. Building is heated with district heating.
name: Helsinki

action_description: Ventilation of big rooms with varying number of users (gym halls, gala halls, auditoriums, etc.) was modified to be automatically controlled by the real ventilation need i.e. indoor air quality. Replacement of ventilation machines and control systems.
name: Helsinki

action_description: Already 35000 street lights have been replaced with more energy efficient lights.
name: Helsinki

action_description: City level optimization and planning of the reduction of transport needs of excavation waste. The target is to use the excavation waste near the source and there is a city level coordinator to coordinate the excavation masses. The cost and energy savings achieved varies yearly. The cost savings have been between 4 - 14 M€ yeras 2014-2016.
name: Helsinki

action_description: Construction of a new energy efficient building for the urban art and music academy
name: Herentals

action_description: Relighting of the podium lights, foyer, hallways, …

action_description: In replacement of two old vehicles, the city purchased two electrical vans.
name: Herentals

action_description: The regional network managment institution (Eandis) supports individuals with a subsidy for buyinh roof insulation for their houses.
name: Herent

action_description: The municipality buys 100% of its electricity from Renewable Energy Sources
name: Herent

action_description: The regional network management institution (Eandis) supports individuals with a subsidy for buying a heat pump to heat their private house.
name: Herent

action_description: Replacing 2 old vehicles powered by diesel by new vehicles on natural gas.

action_description: Local volunteers repair all kinds of household equipment for free. When this equipment needs to be repaired by a professional, the cost would be higher then the purchase of a new appliance. By organising a repair café the local authority stimulates the reuse of equipment and reduces the amount of waste.
name: Herenthout

action_description: Turning of a part of the public lighting during the night and replacing old public lighting by new LED-lights
name: Herenthout

action_description: Het plaatsen van twee oplaadpalen op twee openbare plaatsen in Herk-de-Stad. Dit om mensen aan te moedigen om te kiezen voor een elektrisch voertuig.
name: Herk-de-Stad

action_description: Collectieve renovatie is een pilootproject, geïnitieerd door de provincie Limburg. Belangstellende gemeenten hebben zich aangemeld en vormen een pilootwerkgroep, welke op regelmatige basis samenkomt om kennis en ervaringen uit te wisselen. Doel is om bestaande woningen in particulier eigendom binnen hun gemeente collectief te renoveren naar BEN niveau. Deze collectiviteit kan geografisch zijn (wijk/ aantal straten), of bijvoorbeeld morfologisch (open oproep). Zowel voor de wijkaanpak als de open oproep wordt via de provincie door de partners Stebo en Dubolimburg een aanbod voorzien. Gemeenten komen hiervoor pas in aanmerking als zij een startnota met planning, personeelsinzet en financiering hebben ingevuld. De gemeenten bepalen zelf welke aanpak zij kiezen (of een combinatie van beiden) en welke wijk of doelgroep.
name: Herk-de-Stad

action_description:
Verdelen van duurzame drinkflessen aan de personeelsleden van de gemeente, alsook aan de lagere schoolkinderen van Herk-de-Stad. 
Stimuleren van het drinken van kraantjeswater. Alle gemeentelijke gebouwen hebben een drinkwatersysteem waar er gebruik gemaakt wordt van kraantjeswater.
name: Herk-de-Stad

name: Herrera

action_description: Dimming the public lighting sooner and reignate it later in order to save energy, choose for energy-efficient LED public lighting
name: Herselt

action_description: Renewal of the heating installation in building  of the youth movement (Verbrand Goor)

action_description: The Municipality is cooperating with the schools for the implementation of a scientific project called: Junior Energy Inspectors in Action.

action_description:
Het gemeentebestuur heeft het mooie ophaalmachinegebouw op het voormalige mijnterrein gerenoveerd tot een multifunctioneel pand met ruimte voor 3 “hoofdfuncties”, namelijk een passiefschool, een geklasseerd bezoekersgedeelte - het Atrium - en ruimtes voor commerciële en/of nijverheidsactiviteiten.

De eerste herbestemming van het ophaalmachinegebouw is de  huisvestiging van het Centrum voor Volwassenenonderwijs Heusden-Zolder (CVO).

Het schoolgedeelte maakt deel uit van een pilootproject waarbij 24 Vlaamse passiefscholen verspreid over alle provincies en onderwijsnetten zullen gebouwd worden. 

Het nieuwe gedeelte dat aan de parkingzijde of noordzijde van het gerenoveerde gebouw werd opgetrokken, is een volledige passiefbouw waarbij een maximaal gebruik van duurzame materialen en technieken wordt nagestreefd.
name: Heusden-Zolder

action_description:
Elke Limburgse particuliere eigenaar kan tot 10.000 euro ontlenen voor verschillende energiebesparende maatregelen (het plaatsen van hoogrendementsglas en bijhorende raamprofielen, het vervangen van verwarmingsinstallaties door een energiezuinige verwarmingsketel of voor isolatie van dak, kelder en muren. Ook de installatie van een warmtepomp of zonneboiler is mogelijk).

De lening moet worden terugbetaald over vijf jaar, aan een interest van 2%. Voor financieel kwetsbare gezinnen bedraagt de interest 0%. 

Duwolim is de organisatie waar je in Limburg voor deze Vlaamse Energielening terecht kan. Je krijgt niet alleen een goedkope lening, maar ook deskundig advies. 
Duwolim verstrekte 153 leningen in Heusden-Zolder op een Limburgs totaal van bijna 2000.
name: Heusden-Zolder

action_description:
De gemeente verleende subsidies voor verschillende investeringen die te maken hebben met energiebesparing, uitgevoerd in de periode tussen 1 januari 2008 en 31 december 2013. Als overgangsmaatregel kon je in 2014 nog een dossier indienen voor investeringen die uitgevoerd werden in 2013.
Oorspronkelijk ging het om subsidies voor het plaatsen van condensatieketels op aardgas en stookolie, PV-installaties, zonneboilers, warmtepompen, ventilatiesystemen met warmterecuperatie en isolatie.
In 2011 besliste de gemeenteraad het subsidiebeleid bij te sturen en vooral toe te spitsen op ingrepen die te maken hebben met het beperken van energieverliezen (dak-, muur-, vloer- en kelderisolatie, vervanging oude ruiten door superisolerend glas).

In het totaal werden 4906 subsidieaanvragen behandeld. Daarbij werd een totaal bedrag van
€ 1.642.848,44 uitbetaald.
name: Heusden-Zolder

Obyvatelé Hlinska i díky osvete ve vysoké míre využili možnost cerpání dotacních prostredku z Programu Zelená úsporám. Díky tomu byla realizována úsporná opatrení v hodnote témer 900 mil. Kc.

action_description:
Hondarribiko udalerrian 2005 urtetik 2010 urtera 197 hektarea baso landatu dira. Landatutako baso azalerak burututako
karbono xurgapenak ezagutzeko 2005 urteko baso inbentarioaren espezieak hartu dira kontuan. Honela, baso hektareak
Hondarrin 13,4 tona CO2/ha xurgatzen direla estimatu da.
2011 urtetik aurrera urtero batazbeste 1ha-ko azalera landatu da, urtero ospatzen den Zuhaitz egunean. Hurrengo urteetan
azalera berdina mantentzea aurreikusten da. Landatutako espezieak, batez ere, Lizarra (Fraxinus Excelsior ) eta Ametza
(Quercus pyrenaica ) izango dira.
Neurri honek 2020 urtean 2.784 tona CO2ko murrizpena lortuko du

action_description:
With the purpose of improving the energy efficiency of municipal facilities and contributing to the actions against climate change, the system of accounting and energy management implemented, allows achieving an exhaustive monitoring and analytics of the energy consumption of the municipal facilities and identifying the opportunities for energy saving and improvements in supplies.
Therefore, the Regional Agency of the Energy (Agència Comarcal de l’Energia de la Selva) carries out the own tasks of a municipal energetic manager to follow the patterns of consumption in the different municipal facilities with the aim of incorporating habits changes and make small investments as improvement actions of municipal energy efficiency, and monitor the possible incidents in the billing.
name: Hostalric

action_description: La Commune de Hotton procède à la replantation de haies, de manière intensive, depuis 2012. Cette action concerne notamment le trace RAVEL entre Bourdon et Marche-en-Famenne mais porte aussi sur l'offre gratuite de plans aux particuliers. A ce jour, ce sont plus de 6600 plants qui ont été mis en oeuvre. Les essences utilises sont exclusivement indigenes, tells que: h^tre, charme, noisetier, sorbier, aubépine, cornouiller, etc.
name: Hotton

action_description:
NAC2012: 
MUNICIPAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND ORGANISATION
The municipality has a goal of 90% reduction of its own CO-2 emissions by 2050. A first important step for achieving this goal was building a new energy efficient administrative building to house several services that were housed in older buildings on several locations. A big part of the CO-2 reductions comes from the clean technologies that were used. The other part arises from an increase in efficiency due to the centralisation of services.
name: Houthalen-Helchteren

action_description: Onze gemeente neemt deel aan het proeftuinproject Werfgoed. Het project heeft tot doelstelling het in de markt zetten van doorgedreven energierenovaties bij particuliere woningen, ook wel BEN (Bijna EnergieNeutraal) genoemd. Voor onze gemeente werd de wijk Limbouw uitgekozen om een collectief renovatietraject op te zetten in samenwerking met onder andere Stebo en Dubolimburg. De opzet is om de eigenaar zoveel mogelijk te ontzorgen door onafhankelijk technisch en financieel advies en renovatiebegeleiding.
name: Houthalen-Helchteren

action_description: In 2013 the province of Limburg issued a framework agreement for the purchase of electricity. Houthalen-Helchteren and all the other municipalities in Limburg joined in and were guaranteed the delivery of 100% green electricity.

action_description:
The Ilioupolis Municipality participated as a pilot municipality for the district of Attica, Greece, in the European project GREEN TWINNING funded by the European program Intelligent Energy Europe (<U+0399><U+0395><U+0395>). The project relates in particular to the transfer of know-how from European municipalities with significant experience in sustainable energy policy (Municipalities of Spain ) to the Municipalities of Attica (Greece), and four other Regions, by four European countries.
Under the project, the Ilioupolis Municipality signed a twinning agreement with the Spanish municipality of Maracena, Spain which  is considered as a pilot municipality in sustainable energy policy.
The exchange of experiences between Ilioupolis Municipality and the City of Maracena, focused mainly in the axes:
1.	Awareness of citizens on energy saving
2.	Energy saving in public buildings
name: Ilioupolis

action_description: Grazie alla sensibilizzazione sul fotovoltaico promossa dal progetto di Comunità solare “Adotta un pannello”, la potenza installata tra il 2011 e il 2015 per impianti non destinati al residenziale ha raggiunto e superato, con ben 1.389,2 kWp, il valore che era stato previsto entro il 2020 in occasione della redazione del PAES.
name: Inzago

action_description: Nell’autunno del 2012 il Comune di Inzago ha promosso l’attivazione di una Comunità solare, mettendo a disposizione (in concessione per 20 anni) la superficie della copertura della Scuola Secondaria di Primo Grado “John e Robert Kennedy”, in via Leopardi a Inzago, per la realizzazione di un impianto fotovoltaico da parte dei cittadini, attraverso una formula di azionariato diffuso: i cittadini investono in una quota di potenza dell’impianto da realizzare e usufruiscono degli incentivi del 4° Conto energia e dell’energia immessa in rete, mentre il Comune usufruisce dell’energia autoconsumata (e quindi di un risparmio sulla bolletta elettrica relativamente al costo della fornitura di energia).
name: Inzago

action_description:
Nell’estate del 2015 il Comune di Inzago ha realizzato interventi di riqualificazione energetica sul proprio patrimonio attraverso l’intervento di un soggetto ESCO e la sottoscrizione di un contratto EPC di rendimento energetico. 
L’investimento verrà ripagato attraverso un canone annuo di circa 81.000€ per 15 anni. Grazie al risparmio energetico e alla produzione energetica da sistemi di cogenerazione gli interventi garantiranno un risparmio economico annuo di oltre 85.000€ annui.
Gli interventi sono stati realizzati nell’ambito del progetto “Energy Efficiency Milan Covenant of Mayors” che la Provincia di Milano ha attivato nel 2009/10 nell’ambito della linea di finanziamento ELENA dell’Unione Europea, rivolta ai Comuni e alle strutture di supporto aderenti al Patto dei Sindaci (Covenant of Mayors).
name: Inzago

action_description: Alto Trevigiano servizi è società del consorzio dei comuni che si occupa del trattamento delle acque. le azioni previste nel Paes sono state attuate per circa il 40% al 2015, e sono quasi tutte in fase di completamento nel 2017, questa azione ha permesso di contenere i consumi energetici che, a causa dei cambiamenti climatici, e quindi della scarsità di acqua sarebbero stati molto più alti.
name: IPA DIAPASON

action_description: L'intervento avviato nel 2015 ma concluso nel 2016 ha consentito un notevole risparmio energetico e per come è stato realizzato è anche stato educativo per i bambine e le famiglie.

action_description:
Al fine di valorizzare l’acqua potabile dell’acquedotto pubblico, in un’ottica di riduzione dei rifiuti in plastica prodotti dai cittadini per l’acquisto di acqua, è stata realizzata una fontana pubblica per l'erogazione di acqua di alta qualità ai cittadini di Ittiri.

Il progetto ha previsto anche la contemporanea installazione di sei depuratori per la produzione di acqua naturalizzata in cinque scuole e nella mensa scolastica di Ittiri.
name: Ittiri

action_description: Nel sito in cui si è realizzata la fontana pubblica (Azione SO 08 - Realizzazione di una fontana pubblica e di depuratori di acqua naturalizzata per le scuole comunali) sono inoltre stati sostituiti i vecchi lampioni a vapori di sodio, da 150W ciascuno, con nuove armature per impianti a LED.
name: Ittiri

action_description: In base alla convenzione Consip, gli interventi sono stati preventivati a canone per un importo pari al 17,7 % del complessivo.E' stata prevista la sostituzione di circa il 40% dei corpi illuminanti con lampade aventi tecnologie più efficienti. Attualmente si è già intervanuti su circa 950 lampade a vapori di mercurio sostituendole con lampade con tecnologia a led. Inoltre si è provveduto al ricablaggio, onde limitare i consumi, di circa 190 lampade a vapori di sodio.
name: Ivrea

action_description:
L’allegato energetico-ambientale al regolamento edilizio del Comune di Ivrea, promuove interventi edilizi volti a: - ottimizzare le prestazioni energetiche ed ambientali dell’involucro edilizio e dell’ambiente costruito; - migliorare l’efficienza energetica del sistema edificio-impianti; - utilizzare fonti rinnovabili di energia; - contenere i consumi idrici; - utilizzare materiali bio-compatibili ed eco-compatibili. 
Questi obiettivi sono perseguiti attraverso l’introduzione di prescrizioni e attraverso la definizione di livelli prestazionali minimi di qualità. Vengono distinti requisiti cogenti e requisiti incentivati.
name: Ivrea

action_description: Progetto EnergeticaMente: nei Quartieri Bellavista e San Lorenzo di Ivrea si è compiuto un percorso di monitoraggio e riduzione dei consumi di energia elettrica. Il progetto, finanziato dal Programma Housing della Compagnia di San Paolo, è stato realizzato dall'associazione BellavistaViva con Casematte e Ciclobus. Attraverso sopralluoghi a campione in quindici alloggi, è stata effettuata una verifica sui consumi energetici:  l’installazione di misuratori di consumo elettrico da presa, ha permesso di capire se gli elettrodomestici ad essi collegati consumano troppo. E’ stato anche somministrato un questionario per verificare le abitudini ed evidenziare eventuali comportamenti scorretti. Nel percorso di monitoraggio sono stati coinvolti abitanti attivi nel quartiere, che hanno affiancato l'esperto.
name: Ivrea

action_description: 1. rujna 2014. godine otvoren je niskoenergetski Djecji vrtic Radost, Gornji Desinec Grad Jastrebarsko. U objektu se koriste obnovljivi izvori energije. Sustav grijanja izveden je s kotlovima na drvnu biomasu s visokim koeficijentom efikasnosti dok je hladenje objekta realizirano rashladnim jedinicama s EER od 3,1. Rasvjetna tijela unutar zgrade izvedene su energetski efikasnim T5 fluocijevima s ucinkovitim rasterom dok je vanjska rasvjeta izvedena s visokotlacinim natrijem kao izvorom svjetlosti.
name: Jastrebarsko

action_description:
Vlada Republike Hrvatske, Ministarstvo graditeljstva i prostornoga uredenja i Ministarstvo zaštite okoliša i prirode donijeli su 27. ožujka 2014. godine Program energetske obnove obiteljskih kuca, kojeg provodi Fond za zaštitu okoliša i energetsku ucinkovitost. Cilj je Programa povecanje energetske ucinkovitosti postojecih kuca, smanjenje potrošnje energije i emisija CO2 u atmosferu te smanjenje mjesecnih troškova za energente, uz ukupno poboljšanje kvalitete života.
U sklopu javnih natjecaja Fond je odobrio  52 subvencije za energetsku obnovu obiteljskih kuca na podrucju Grada Jastrebarsko.

action_description: In the period of 2010 to 2011 in 7 educational buildings (2 elementary schools, 2 secondary schools, 3 kindergartens) were carried out energy efficiency improvement measures aiming at reduction of heat consumption by 43%. The main works: windows replacement, roof and exterior wall insulation, heating and ventilation system alignment. This action was financed with support from National program "Climate Change Finance Instrument" (85%) local municipality (15%)
name: Jelgava

action_description: With support of National program "Climate Change  Finance Instrument" (63%) and with support of local municipality (37%) in 2013 was implemented project aiming at reduction of electricity consumption in public lighting by 60%. There were installed 668 LED street luminaries with 23 lighting control system units in 12 streets.
name: Jelgava

action_description: New cogeneration power plant started to work in September of 2013, allowing movement from using imported fossil fuel to biomass consumption for producing heat and electricity. It provides heat up to 85% of the Jelgava district heating load. In parallel in 2012 was constructed junction and trunk heating stages of centralized heating supply systems on both sides of the local river Lielupe and in 2013 main heating junction construction in Rupniecibas-Dambja street. Altogether 77931921 EUR was invested and prognosis for used RES in production of heat and electricity per year by 2020 is 544645 MWh and with an assumption that in production of heat and electricity will be used natural gas, 108612 CO2 emissions per year by 2020 will be reduced.
name: Jelgava

action_description: With support of Environment, Nature conservation and nuclear safety Ministry of Germany (40%), of local municipality (9%) and of residents of the building (51%) within the international pilot project "Modernization of heating system of Jelgava city" coordinated by IWO from Germany and implemented by JNIP, Ltd. from Jelgava in 2009 were made full refurbishment of multi-residential building in Helmana street 3. After the renovation, heat energy consumption was 98.76 kWh /m², which is 57.4 % less than before (232.1 kWh /m²). In 2010 this building received an award "Most energy efficient multi-residential building in 2010" in the national competition organized by the Ministry of Economics of Latvia.  In 2013 the building was nominated with title "Good practice of German building technologies" awarded by "German-Baltic trade chamber" and Ministry of Economics and technologies of Germany.
name: Jelgava

action_description:
The sustainable building regulation
 is an environmental assessment method for rating and certifying the performance of new homes and also for renovated ones. Municipality of Jesi  adopted the sustainable building regulation  on 2016 and it includes a scheme of incentives (reduction of urbanization costs) for buildings based on the energy label reached in new and renovated buildings . 
Several certifications or labels are admitted such as Passivehaus, CasaClima, ClimaAbita, Itaca, Leeds in order to guarantee high level of comfort and low energy  consumption.
name: Jesi

action_description: The walking school bus is a group of children walking to school with one or more adults. Like a traditional bus, walking buses have a fixed route with designated "bus stops" and "pick up times" in which they pick up children.The aims are to raise concern for the environment, encourage physical activity by teaching children the skills to walk safely, how to identify safe routes to school, and the benefits of walking, reduce traffic congestion, pollution, and speed near schools. In Jesi there are 18 walking bus routes with over 250 children and 60 adults participating.
name: Jesi

action_description: Die Stadtgemeinde Judenburg gewährt finanzielle Förderungen für die Durchführung von Wärmedämmmaßnahmen, die Errichtung von thermischen Solaranlagen und Photovoltaikanlagen, den Einbau von Biomasseheizungen sowie für die Errichtung einer Wärmepumpe.
name: Judenburg

action_description:
Die Stadtwerke Judenburg errichten ein Wärmeverteilnetz mit einer Anschlussleistung von 14 MW im Endausbau. Die Wärme kommt über eine 18 km lange Infrastrukturleitung aus der Zellstofffabrik Pöls, wo sie als Biomasse-Abwärme entsteht. 
Die Idee eines Fernwärmenetzes für die Judenburger Innenstadt entstand bei der Planung einer Biomasseheizung für das Altenheim. Weil es in den Nachbargemeinden Fohnsdorf und Zeltweg bereits Fernwärmenetze gab, wurde die lange angedachte Nutzung der Abwärme aus der Zellstofffabrik Pöls endlich realisierbar. Alle Gemeindewohnhäuser und alle vormals mit Gas beheizten Öffentlichen Gebäude wurden bereits angeschlossen.
Das Gesamtprojekt wurde 2015 mit dem österreichischen Klimaschutzpreis ausgezeichnet. Die Leitung soll demnächst bis nach Knittelfeld verlängert werden.
name: Judenburg

action_description:
is Ende 2013 wurden alle 22 kommunalen Wohnbauten, die im Stadtgebiet entlang des
Leitungsstrangs liegen, an die Fernwärme angeschlossen. Die Wohnhäuser haben insgesamt 402
Wohneinheiten und eine beheizbare Wohnnutzfläche von gesamt 21.714,71 m².Die
Anschlussleistung beträgt 1,5 MW. Die Anschlusskosten für alle 22 Wohnhäuser betrugen 150.000 €
(100 € pro kW Anschlussleistung).
name: Judenburg

name: Judenburg

action_description: Alle mit Erdgas beheizten öffentlichen Gebäude (Rathaus, Feuerwehr, Veranstaltungszentrum, Bauhof, PUCH-Museum, ehemaliges Jesuitenkloster) wurden an die Biomasse-Fernwärme, die aus Abwärme der Zellstofffabrik Pöls gespeist wird, angeschlossen. Insgesamt wurden ca. 2.400 MWh Wärme aus Erdgas substituiert.

action_description: “Met Belgerinkel naar de Winkel” is een jaarlijkse sensibilisatiecampagne in de maand mei die het fietsen van en naar de buurtwinkel wil promoten, i.s.m met de Vlaamse gemeenten. “Met Belgerinkel naar de winkel” is een campagne met veel facetten en grote partners (UNIZO, CM, Gezinsbond, Fietsersbond,...). Het project promoot de lokale handel, bevordert de gezondheid door een portie dagelijkse beweging en draagt bij tot een betere leef- en woonomgeving. Kort samengevat is de formule als volgt: fietsende klanten krijgen telkens zij met de fiets winkelen bij een deelnemende handelaar een kans om mee te dingen naar mooie prijzen in Vlaamse en lokale prijzenpot. Tot 2013 verzamelden zij deze kansen met een spaarkaart.
name: Kinrooi

action_description:
Elke Limburgse particuliere eigenaar kan tot 10.000 euro ontlenen voor verschillende energiebesparende maatregelen (het plaatsen van hoogrendementsglas en bijhorende raamprofielen, het vervangen van verwarmingsinstallaties door een energiezuinige verwarmingsketel of voor isolatie van dak, kelder en muren. Ook de installatie van een warmtepomp of zonneboiler is mogelijk).

De lening moet worden terugbetaald over vijf jaar, aan een interest van 2%. Voor financieel kwetsbare gezinnen bedraagt de interest 0%. 

Duwolim is de organisatie waar je in Limburg voor deze Vlaamse Energielening terecht kan. Je krijgt niet alleen een goedkope lening, maar ook deskundig advies. 
Duwolim verstrekte al bijna 2000 leningen.
name: Kinrooi

action_description:
De provincie Limburg steunt het Vlaamse initiatief ‘Energiescans’, dat via Infrax wordt georganiseerd. Een professionele adviseur van Stebo komt bij burgers aan huis en licht de woning door. Hij gaat op zoek naar nutteloos energieverbruik, door het gebouw, de thermostaat, de verwarmingsinstallatie het waterverbruik en de verlichting te bekijken. Hierna kan de ‘energiescanner’ meteen enkele maatregelen treffen (vb. tochtstrips of spaardouchekop). Tenslotte krijgt de burger advies over mogelijke meer ingrijpende maatregelen. Aansluitend kan men begeleiding krijgen bij de uitvoering van deze volgende stappen (o.m.  in het kader van een Duwolim-lening). 
Een gezin kan zo makkelijk 30% besparen op energie én dus ook héél wat geld uitsparen.  Er werden regelmatig artikels in de gemeentelijke publicaties geplaatst.
Er zijn in de periode 2012 tot en met 2014 43 energiescans uitgevoerd.
name: Kinrooi

action_description: Het gemeentebestuur van Kinrooi gaf in de jaren 2006 tot en met 2012 subsdie voor de installatie van zonneboilers. in de periode van 2007 tot en met 2012 ook voor photovoltaische zonnepanelen (tot en met 2011), warmtepomp en warmtepompboiler
name: Kinrooi

action_description: Action was related to the municipal heating system of Koscierzyna. Under the project, 1137m of new district heating network was built and combined heating systems boiler room K-1 and K-2 with installation of the boiler room node group on K-2. Moreover, 1251m over 40-years old network was modernized to network with pre-insulated duct. Action indirectly contributes to the reduction of CO2 emissions from the city, the network expansion will allow to connect to new customers, thus reducing low emissions, while the pre-insulated network reduced transmission losses.
name: Koscierzyna

action_description: Action consisted of two projects, educational and informative addressed to the inhabitants of the city and county, ie., "Koscierzyna says YES to energy saving" and "Koscierzyna - the city with the climate." As part of the implemented activities: poster contest and campaign logo, educational talks and art contest for pupils of primary schools, environment training for Secondary Schools, ecological seminar for pupils of Secondary Schools, environmental workshops, 5-minutes educational video combined with interviews with residents, 30 seconds spots in radio and television, publications: Opportunities for energy saving in the home, "Mr. bulb saves energy and learn the world", a series of articles devoted to the campaign in the press and on the website of the city, notes, photo contest "Energy Efficiency in Art", a poster campaign involving energy ambassadors, a two-day nationwide conference.
name: Koscierzyna

action_description: The investment project was thermomodernization of 6 public buildings in Koscierzyna, including 3 historic school buildings being under conservator protection, 2 building of kindergartens and Social Welfare Centre. The scope of works included 4.167,2m2 wall insulation (polystyrene) and roof (mineral wool), 521,04m2 replacement window and door 55,5m2 and modernization of central heating systems, replacement of pipes, radiators, valves and control automation, increasing the efficiency of the whole system . Replacing damaged woodwork in historic buildings require precision and mapping them while maintaining the historic division and details while meeting the conditions of high thermal insulation as double glazed windows and 3glass windows heat transfer coefficient for the whole window of U = 1.2.
name: Koscierzyna

action_description: Within above mentioned task, project “KAWKA in Koscierzyna. Reduction of low emission through thermal modernization of buildings: Dworcowa 1, Dworcowa 5, 3 Maja 11, 8 Marca 47, Rynek 6 and Miodowa 10" was executed. It covered complex thermo-modernization and connection to the MPI KOS-EKO six municipal buildings and installation of 75 solar collectors for heating water. In the second edition of the project, thermal retrofit covered 4 municipal residential buildings (Kapliczna 9, Mlynska 6, Traugutta 4, Wybickiego 8) and were installed 44 solar panels.
name: Koscierzyna

action_description: Partnership project of the Association Solar Koscierzyna and the Municipality of Koscierzyna "Solar Koscierzyna - solar installations building as an opportunity for permanent improvement of air quality by using renewable energy sources" including the construction of 125 units solar systems for heating  water in residential buildings located throughout the city. The main objective of the project is an improvement of air quality through the use of energy from renewable sources. The result of production during the year about 575 GJ of clean energy and reduction of coal consumption by approx. 38,77t. There will be a year reduction of air emissions by 0.37t of SO2, about 38.77kg of NOx, 77.5t of CO2 and 1.74t of CO, as well as 0,78t of particulate matter. Average annual savings on energy bills of all residential buildings involved in the project will amount to 27 125 PLN (approx. 6 800 €).
name: Koscierzyna

action_description: Replacement of existing bulbs with bulbs of led technology for saving electricity to streetlights of the Municipal unit of Kozani in the Kozani Municipality.
name: Kozani

action_description:
Installation of a power factor (cos) correction system via balance of capacitors layout
The balance is usually centrally, but it may be considered appropriate to be locally, depending on the geography of electrical power distribution network and the major consumers. 
The engines require for their operation idler power, which is available from the mains, with the relevant fee. With the installation of the above provisions, a correction of the power factor, leads to a considerable reduction of requested idler power from the establishment, with corresponding economic benefits.
name: Kozani

action_description:
The action concerns the installation of photovoltaic power systems of 10 <U+039A>Wp on the roof of 16 municipal buildings.
From this project  is going to be produced 208 MWh/year of green electricity.
name: Kozani

action_description:
This intervention concerns the energy upgrade of 3 Municipal Buildings: 
1.	The town hall of Kozani.
1.	Technical service.
2.	The school complex of Xirolimni.
The goal is to implement actions and proven best practices for the reduction of energy consumption in the urban environment, with emphasis in the building sector and the upgrading of communal areas. More specifically, the measures include energy upgrade of the  building envelope, of E/M refrigeration equipment and the energy upgrade of lighting system:
name: Kozani

action_description:
This intervention concerns the Construction of a Model bioclimatic School complex elementary - kindergarten with application of Renewable Energy Sources technology in the area of BUILDING BLOCK15 Smart Active Urban Planning Kozani.
A model bioclimatic building of 4.200m²with maximum capacity 250 pupils and 50 infants will be constructed, which focuses on the modern requirements in construction schools, with particular emphasis on energy and environmental characteristics as extensive use of renewable energy sources. 
More specifically, it is to be extended and combined use of RES systems: 
<U+F076>	Geothermal energy
<U+F076>	Photovoltaic Installations
<U+F076>	Solar thermal system
<U+F076>	District heating
<U+F076>	Low-emissivity Glass
<U+F076>	Reinforced insulations

Also the building is classified as energy class B+ according to the new Regulation of Energy Efficiency buildings
name: Kozani

action_description:
The action concerns the installation of photovoltaic power stations of 4.84 <U+039A>Wp on the roofs of building complexes: 
1.	On the elementary school of Nea Charavgi, and
2.	On the 3rd gymnasium of Kozani
name: Kozani

action_description:
For dealing with the problems of light pollution as the most appropriate solution the Municipality of Kozani proceeded to set up a remote management system with dimmable lighting, utilizing various funding programs.
The management systems are the most modern solution for remote monitoring, control and management of a municipal network lighting.
name: Kozani

action_description:
Participation of the municipality of Kozani in the European promotion program of electric drive. This initiative has the following as its objectives:
<U+F076>	Acceleration of the widespread introduction of electric vehicles (EVS) on the European market
<U+F076>	Harmonization with the policy of the European Union on the efficient use of electricity and the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions
<U+F076>	Direct introduction on the market of commercially viable different types - models of EVS
<U+F076>	42 Participants join forces for the achievement of these objectives with the project Green Emotion
In Greece in cooperation with  HPPC and municipality of Kozani, have created the first pilot project of electric driving based on the experience and good practices of pilot projects. Nine charging stations have been installed in Kozani and 7 electric vehicles have been in use for a year on the roads of the city.
name: Kozani

action_description: This intervention concerns the construction of a model of creche daycare of 1800sq/ft, which is able to accept 72 children including 20 children with disabilities, in ZEP Kozani.It is designed in accordance with the principles of bioclimatic design and”healthy buildings"  so as to minimize the amount of energy required, while at the same time a part of the needs will be met from renewable sources (solar and geothermal energy), while the materials to be used indoors is compatible with the requirements of the "Healthy buildings" to ensure the good quality of air
name: Kozani

action_description:
Kristianstad aims to increase the production of wind power within its geographic area into equalling half of the local electricity consumption. 

In the year of 2014, there are 40 privately owned wind turbines operating within the area, together producing about 145 GWh of electricity per year, and the number of turbines is steadily increasing. The electricity is sold on the market and sent into the grid. 2016 another 18 wind turbines will be operating producing another 107 GWh renewable electricity.
name: Kristianstad

action_description: In order to reduce the carbon dioxide emissions in the region of Kristianstad the municipality owned company C4 Energi AB have connected buildings, residential and commercial, to Kristian-stad city’s district heating (DH) system.  It has been an on-going process in Kristianstad since the1980’s to connect buildings to the DH system. Today major parts of the city are served by DH and new areas are continually added, the project is still in progress!. District heating is one of the most cost efficient ways to heat your house in Sweden and causes a minimum of emissions. In Kristianstad the CHP plant cogenerates both heat and electricity and uses 100 % bioenergy as fuel and contributes to the goal of becoming a fossil fuel free municipality.
name: Kristianstad

action_description: Waste management is closely related to energy and climate issues since waste can both generate greenhouse gas emissions and reduce them when used as a bio fuel.  The large agricultural sector in Kristianstad generates considerable amounts of manure and the food industry produces lots of organic waste. In Kristianstad digestion of organic matter into biogas has become the most important way to reduce the negative environmental impacts of waste and instead use it as an energy resource. Recycling is also an important part of waste management in Kristianstad and material that neither can be recycled nor digested is to a large extent incinerated with energy extraction. The biogas plant, as well as the units for upgrading gas, is owned by the municipal company, Kristianstad Biogas which is a part of the municipal energy company, C4 Energi
name: Kristianstad

action_description: Grad Križevci i Fond za zaštitu okoliša i energetsku ucinkovitost sufinanciraju korištenje obnovljivih izvora energije u kucanstvima. Mjera obuhvaca: ugradnja solarnih toplinskih kolektora, povecanje energetske ucinkovitosti sustava grijanja ugradnjom plinskih kondenzacijskih kotlova, ugradnja kotlova na biomasu, drvnu sjecku/pelete, pirolitickih kotlovi na drva te ugradnja dizalica topline. Ovu je mjeru realiziralo 34 kucanstava.
name: Križevci

action_description: Grad Križevci u suradnji sa Fondom za zaštitu okoliša i energetsku ucinkovitost sufinanciraju energetsku obnovu kucanstava i to: ugradnju/zamjenu energetski ucinkovite stolarije, obnovu vanjske ovojnice, obnovu krovišta. Na taj je nacin do kraja 2014. godine obnovljeno 71 kucanstvo. Rezultat navedenih mjera je: obnovljeno 5.683,35 m2 fasada, zamjena 804,07 m2 stolarije, obnovljeno 1.759,66 m2 krovišta.
name: Križevci

action_description: Gradsko vijece je donijelo odluku o smanjenju komunalnog doprinosa za nove zgrade u stambenom sektoru i to 25% za gradnju prema niskoenergetskom standardu te 50% za gradnju prema pasivnom standardu.
name: Križevci

action_description:
Grad Križevci pridružio se naprednim europskim gradovima u borbi protiv globalnog zatopljenja cime smo se obvezali na primjenu brojnih mjera EnU. Jedna od mjera je projekt modernizacije sustava javne rasvjete. Obavljen je energetski pregled javne rasvjete na podrucju samog Grada. Zamijenili smo 1.668 rasvjetnih tijela sa novim visokoefikasnim svjetiljkama. Svi novo predvideni izvori svjetlosti su natrijeve visokotlacne žarulje nove generacije. U protekle 3 godine ostvarene su energetske uštede od prosjecno 360,28 MWh/god. te smanjenje emisija CO2 108,75 t/god.
Potrebno je još obaviti energetski pregled javne rasvjete ruralnih podrucja JLS Križevci kako bi i tu postigli zadane uštede.
name: Križevci

action_description: Project consist of upgrade of public lighting of l'Alcúdia with the aim of improving its energy efficiency using an energy service company (ESCO). Project was implemented wihin ZeroCO(2) project. Duration of ESCO contract is linked to the time required for investment total cost recovery. Total investment is shared between l'Alcúdia and private party. The cost recovery mechanism adopted is "guaranteed savings" (private party guarantees a saving rate) with savings at the end of the project (economic savings achieved are entirely used to finance the project. Town council doesn't perceive any reduction of facility energy bill until the private party recovers the investment). A tendering process was launched and 3 companies applied for the P4 contract. The intervention in public street lighting embraced 2,673 poles
name: L'Alcúdia

action_description: The municipality of l'Alcúdia (Valencia, Spain) and the municipality of Giurgiu (Romania) have signed a Twinning Agreement in order to exchange expertise and best practices related to RES & RUE issues.The kick-off meeting was conducted on 25-26th April 2013 in Spain. Mayors of both municipalities formally signed the Memorandum of Agreement up.Twinning agreements bring together municipalities in order to develop administrations capacity related to CoM initiative and even to facilitate the adoption of successful RES & RUE actions implemented previously by the other partner.Up to date, main activities have been addressed to share know-how about refurbishment of public street lighting and sustainable mobility.These activities form part of Green Twinning project (IEE programme).
name: L'Alcúdia

action_description:
S’han iniciat els estudis per al canvi total de l’enllumenat del municipi a tecnologia LED. L’acció està emmarcada en el projecte provincial Beenergi. 
Inclou les mesures següents: 
-	Canvi de lluminàries a tecnologia LED i regulació de flux punt a punt
-	Ajust de la potència contractada
-	Telegestió
-	Sanejament de quadres en estat defectuós.
Aquesta actuació suposarà un estalvi del 67% respecte el consum actual, que suposen un estalvi de 80,79 tnCO2 respecte l’any 2005.
Es durà a terme mitjançant una ESE.

action_description:
Se pretende mantener una gestión forestal sostenible, los montes cuidados, productivos, además de la generación de puestos de trabajo (si es posible) y su explotación de una forma que respeta y conserva la biodiversidad de la zona. 

Debe convertirse en un laboratorio de modelado ambiental cuyo objetivo sea: 
•	Divulgar la Gestión forestal sostenible en el municipio y proporcionar información general sobre el procedimiento y criterios de gestión a todo aquel ciudadano interesado en el tema
•	Actuar como plataforma de comunicación y gestión de datos
•	Proporcionar, de manera segura y eficiente, información específica a los diferentes componentes del sector forestal y a la comunidad científica.
name: LA MATANZA DE ACENTEJO

action_description:
La transformación de los sistemas de abastecimiento de agua convencionales para la sostenibilidad, todo esto necesita tiempo y las tecnologías necesarias. 

En él se enfocarán las diferentes etapas:

•	Gestión de fuentes de abastecimiento
•	Captación de agua suficiente
•	Tratamiento eficiente del agua cruda para lograr la calidad apta para el consumo
•	El uso del agua por los consumidores
•	La recolección y manejo de las aguas residuales y la escorrentía urbana además de su re-uso.

Por eso este plan de excelencia se desarrollará a largo plazo ampliándose hasta el 2030, y pondrá en práctica varios proyectos pilotos, aprendiendo de los costos y los beneficios obtenidos y un plan integral de autosuficiencia energética
name: LA MATANZA DE ACENTEJO

action_description:
El proyecto Parque Natural y Sostenible “El Montillo” habilitará un entorno de demostración e innovación con el objetivo de mejorar la eficiencia y sostenibilidad. Interviene en el equilibrio ambiental y social de un pueblo, y por tanto, este espacio asumirá los conceptos y los objetivos del desarrollo sostenible.
Dicha gestión se apoya en:
•	Una gestión sostenible y un uso eficiente de los recursos naturales.
•	La potenciación del uso público del espacio y la participación ciudadana, considerando los parques y jardines lugares de ocio, encuentro, aprendizaje.. etc.
•	Un espacio para la divulgación y la educación ambiental
•	El consumo de los recursos sea mínimo
•	La vida en el municipio  sea más sana y cómoda
•	La adaptación a modelos tipológicos adecuados al clima
name: LA MATANZA DE ACENTEJO

action_description:
S’ha instal•lat una caldera de biomassa (estella) a l’Alberg de la Vall d’en Bas. La caldera és una Kapelbi per estelles HACK 130 potència modulant de 37 a 133 Kwt, amb un dipòsit per ACS de 500 l, i un dipòsit d’inèrcia de 1.000 l.
L’estella s’emmagatzema en un contenidor amb terra mòbil. 

No té un estalvi d'emissions associat perquè és un equipament nou, si bé cal destacar que no tindrà emissions perquè s'ha fet directament amb biomassa.
name: La Vall d'en Bas

action_description:
Per far fronte alla necessità di ridurre i consumi energetici e le relative emissioni, l'Amministrazione ha avviato
una serie di interventi finalizzati a riqualificare il patrimonio edilizio di proprietà, con particolare attenzione agli edifici scolastici. La continuità di tale azione nel tempo è stata resa possibile attraverso un' accurata scelta delle strutture su cui eseguire le opere e la successiva progettazione degli interventi differenziati sulla base delle diverse priorità e delle caratteristiche del sistema involucro - edificio.
L’intervento di riqualificazione energetica è consistito nella sostituzione della totalità dei serramenti, con posa di
serramenti in PVC con vetro camera basso emissivo.
name: Lainate

action_description:
L'intervento si inserisce nel tema della mobilità sostenibile ed alternativa al mezzo tradizionale privato, rappresentato dall'auto. L'intervento analizza la situazione dello stato di fatto delle piste ciclabili fruibili dalla
cittadinanza.
name: Lainate

action_description:
Il Consorzio CEV nasce nel dicembre 2002 con l’obiettivo di far risparmiare gli Enti sui costi d’acquisto dell’energia.
Sin dagli inizi della propria attività, il Consorzio ha gestito l’operazione d’acquisto dell’energia in sintonia con gli
obiettivi del Protocollo di Kyoto, garantendo ai Soci il 30% d’energia verde in fornitura, senza oneri aggiuntivi, ed
offrendo Loro la possibilità di richiederne fino al 100% energia certificata proveniente da fonti rinnovabili. Con la gara per l’acquisto dell’energia (anno 2009), CEV raggiunge un obiettivo ancora più importante acquistando per i Soci una fornitura 100% d’energia verde, a condizioni particolarmente vantaggiose. Sino ad oggi, oltre l'11% degli Enti Italiani ha aderito al Consorzio per l'energia CEV.
name: Lainate

action_description: Lakatamia organizes with success the eco-festival each year. Attendees had the opportunity to learn about ecological issues and ways to protect the environment and children to engage in various activities and structures. In addition the attendees can inform on energy issues, sustainable mobility through information materials and gifts.

action_description: Lakatamia proceeded with a feasibility study for the exploitation of green waste within their territory. The total amount of green waste amounts to 2,100 tons per year. action_description: Lakatamia following the results of preliminary Energy Audit to the municipal sports facilities, proceeded to the installation of thermal insulation cover for the swimming pool, achieving significant energy savings

In einer Energie- und CO2-Bilanz zeigt die EWL, dass durch technische Maßnahmen Energie und CO2 eingespart werden konnten: Optimierung der Kläranlage, Vergärung des Biomülls, energetische Verwertung der Haushaltsabfälle.

action_description: Die 8.660 installierten Photovoltaikmodule produzieren, mit einer Leistung von 2 MW jährlich rund 2 Mio. kWh. Das entspricht einem Strombedarf von etwa 600 Haushalten. Der Entsorgungs- und Wirtschaftsbetrieb Landau (EWL) hat der EnergieSüdwest AG die Fläche für den Bau der Anlage zur Verfügung gestellt. In enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Entscheidungsträgern der Stadt Landau und der Struktur- und Genehmigungsdirektion Süd (SGD Süd) wurde dem Naturschutz besondere Bedeutung eingeräumt.

action_description: Die Wärmeversorgung des Freizeitbades wurde von Gas auf Geothermie umgestellt. Hierzu wurde ein 1000m tiefes, stillgelegtes Erdölbohrloch genutzt. In einem geschlossenen Kreislauf wird Wasser erhitzt und die Wärme mittels Wärmepumpen als Heizwärme für das Bad zur Verfügung gestellt. Das gemeinsame Projekt der Stadt Landau, des lokalen Energieversorgungs und der Wintershall Holding GmbH wurde im Wettbewerb „365 Orte im Land der Ideen“ ausgezeichnet
name: Landau in der Pfalz

action_description:
La produzione di energia elettrica da fonti rinnovabili con il conseguente annullamento delle emissioni inquinanti ha rappresentato un’importante opportunità per l'amministrazione comunale, permettendo di ottenere vantaggi dal punto di vista energetico e, al contempo, determinando un risparmio economico e una diminuzione delle emissioni di CO2.
L’Amministrazione ha provveduto ad installare 5 impianti fotovoltaici per una potenza complessiva di 97,7 kWp, sulle coperture dei seguenti edifici di proprietà comunale,
- Ex scuola materna 
- Ex scuola elementare Palazzina A 
- Scuola Media 
- Palasport lixius
- Palestra scuola media
prediligendo a tal scopo quelli più "vissuti" e strategici (scuole e impianti sportivi).
Gli impianti, entrati in esercizio nel 2010 hanno fatto registrare una produzione media annua pari a circa 125 MWh.
name: Lanusei

action_description: Tra il 2011 e il 2012 il comune ha provveduto ad effettuare un intervento di efficientamento su parte dell'impianto di illuminazione pubblica comunale. L’intervento ha riguardato la dismissione di circa 440 apparecchi di illuminazione pubblica presenti in 9 diverse zone dell’abitato e l’installazione di n° 446 nuovi apparecchi passando generalmente da lampade a vapori di mercurio da 125 W a lampade a vapori di sodio ad alta pressione con potenze comprese tra 150W, 100W e 70W con ottiche antinquinamento luminoso.Ciascun apparecchio è stato dotato di dispositivo di regolazione del flusso luminoso ed equipaggiato con un reattore che consente la diminuzione della corrente di lampada, del flusso emesso e della potenza assorbita. L’impianto così realizzato consente una regolazione del flusso luminoso di tipo punto-punto.
name: Lanusei

action_description: La produzione di energia elettrica da fonti rinnovabili ha rappresentato e rappresenta un’importante opportunità per il territorio, permettendo di ottenere vantaggi dal punto di vista energetico e determinando un risparmio economico e una diminuzione delle emissioni di CO2.La popolazione e le imprese di Lanusei hanno saputo cogliere l'opportunità dei meccanismi incentivanti, infatti dalla prima metà del 2007 risultano in esercizio e in regime di conto energia 191 impianti fotovoltaici,principalmente di piccola taglia,in quanto realizzati principalmente per autoconsumo e per una potenza complessiva installata di 3,6 MWp Tra aprile 2007 e febbraio 2014 sul territorio comunale sono entrati in esercizio 191 impianti Da gennaio 2015 a dicembre 2016 risultano essere  stati realizzati sul territorio comunale altri 27 impianti fotovoltaici per una ulteriore potenza di circa 0,1 MWp
name: Lanusei

action_description:
According to the Commandment of the Minister, every development with an area larger than 1200 m2 demands 5% of parking places designated for bicycles extra to the prerequisite car parks.
The Technical Services of Larnaka Municipality are responsible for the examination of Building Permit Applications in Larnaka Municipality area. Within the framework of examining building applications, Town Planning officers promote the use of the bicycle and better conditions for cyclists through various interventions. The Municipal Council has approved decisions made by the Town Planning Committee regarding:
Spatial planning of bicycle parking places in apartment buildings 
Spatial planning of bicycle parking spaces and availability of a specific number of bikes in accommodation units 
Spatial planning of bicycle parking spaces and availability of a specific number of bikes in multi storey car parks
name: Larnaca

action_description: The Piyiale Pasia Avenue was upgraded with the construction of cycle paths, walking paths and pedestrians' paths. The walk is around five kilometres in length and aside from the beautiful views of the sea.

action_description:
Every year, Larnaka Municipality organized with a great success the European Mobility Week with the slogan "Our streets, our choice." The events that took place during this week aimed to promote sustainable mobility and encouraging people to use their bicycle as a mean of locomotion. 
Through the European Mobility Week Award scheme, Larnaca received distinction in 2014, as one of the local authorities that was deemed to have done the most in raising public awareness of sustainable mobility issues and implementing measures to achieve a shift towards sustainable urban transport.
name: Larnaca

action_description: The municipality promotes the importance of a modern and well insulated building envelope. Refurbishments were undertaken at residential buildings owned by the municipality in order to reduce the heating energy demand and costs for the residents. At the same time the well insulated and tight building envelope contributes to the overall quality of living.
name: Laxenburg

action_description: All public buildings were furnished with state-of-the-art thermal insulation. Thereby the heating energy demand was significantly reduced as well as the comfort for the users of the buildings improved. Moreover the municipality takes the position of a role model. By such public measures the municipality raised awareness for energy efficiency in buildings and demonstrated the feasibility of building refurbishment. The next step will be renovation or new construction of an existing kindergarten, again using state-of-the-art technology at an highly visible place.
name: Laxenburg

action_description: The energy bookkeeping system for public buildings is an instrument for the detection and evaluation of energy consumption data. On the one hand, the system documents the basic data of the building such as gross and net areas and volumes as well as the overall energy consumption patterns of each object and calculates comparable energy indexes. On the other hand, all energy meter readings are recorded on a monthly basis which is the basis for detailed analysis and the definition of energy saving measures. The system makes energy consumption more transparent for the users of the buildings and thereby raises awareness for the influence of user behaviour on the overall balance.
name: Laxenburg

action_description:
Leicester City Council’s legacy data centre was located within an obsolete 1960’s concrete building, which was no longer fit for purpose and due for demolition during 2014. The council identified a surplus property within the city boundary which was ideal to support both the City Council ICT demands and also the capability for the council to offer shared resource services to local public sector organisations in the East Midlands.

Leicester City Council’s ambition was to create a first class Data Centre combined with exceptional energy performance, to help provide a significant and meaningful contribution to the council’s carbon reduction commitments.
name: Leicester

action_description: Of 33,000 sodium lights, 17,500 have so far been reeplaced with more energy efficient LEDs. At the project's half way mark, we can already see savings of 28% on baseline figures. In addition to the replacement of the bulbs, a Central Management System has been implemented whereby individual bulbs can be dimmed or brightened. This has allowed lights to be dimmed by 25% at 8pm and a further 25% at 11pm to generate further energy savings.
name: Leicester

action_description: Following in the footsteps of the White Lights Street Lighting Project, 129 traffic signal sites will be retrofitted with LED technology over the next 2 years, which will provide a saving of 361 tonnes of carbon. This is a large project with a payback period of 10.5 years, including the savings from reduced energy and maintenance cost and the high life expectancy of the LED technology.
name: Leicester

action_description:
De provincie Limburg organiseert een samenaankoop voor de levering van aardgas en elektriciteit voor alle Limburgse gemeentebesturen. In het contract wordt voorzien dat er 100% groene stroom wordt geleverd. Door deel te nemen aan deze samenaankoop kunnen gemeentebesturen aan gunstigere voorwaarden voorzien in de energiebehoefte van hun gemeentebestuur.
Leopoldsburg doet mee aan deze samenaankoop en gebruikt hierdoor enkel groene stroom in de gemeentelijke gebouwen.
name: Leopoldsburg

action_description: “Met Belgerinkel naar de Winkel” is een jaarlijkse sensibilisatiecampagne in de maand mei die het fietsen van en naar de buurtwinkel wil promoten, i.s.m met de Vlaamse gemeenten. “Met Belgerinkel naar de winkel” is een campagne met veel facetten en grote partners (UNIZO, CM, Gezinsbond, Fietsersbond,...). Het project promoot de lokale handel, bevordert de gezondheid door een portie dagelijkse beweging en draagt bij tot een betere leef- en woonomgeving. Kort samengevat is de formule als volgt: fietsende klanten krijgen telkens zij met de fiets winkelen bij een deelnemende handelaar een kans om mee te dingen naar mooie prijzen in Vlaamse en lokale prijzenpot. Tot 2013 verzamelden zij deze kansen met een spaarkaart, sinds 2014 kan iedere rit afzonderlijk gevalideerd worden via een eigen systeem van Belgerinkelloten met unieke codes.
name: Leopoldsburg

action_description:

Deze installaties staan in voor een groot deel van het elektriciteitsgebruik van de gebouwen waarop ze geplaatst zijn.
name: Leopoldsburg

action_description:
A l’issue d’une étude pour la mise en place d’une stratégie énergétique sur les quartiers de rénovation urbaine, la Ville a décidé de réaliser un projet consistant à :
- interconnecter les 2 réseaux de chauffage urbain, celui de Grand-Ouest (public) et celui des Musiciens (privé) : 24GWh vendus,
     - développer le réseau de chaleur vers de nouvelles zones de desserte (Ile de France, Bécheville…) pour atteindre un total de 42GWh vendus par an et desservir environ 4 000 logements,
- construire une chaufferie biomasse sur le site des Musiciens de 5,8 MW. Conserver la cogénération,
- démolir la chaufferie de Grand-Ouest après la mise en service de la chaufferie biomasse.
name: Les Mureaux

action_description:
On 4 July 2016 Council of Liepaja received ISO 50001 certificate for implementation of energy management in public buildings. 
Municipality ensured monitoring of energy consumption in public buildings since 2012. However, since 2016 energy management in Liepaja is implemented according all the requirements of international standard ISO 50001. It ensures continuous energy monitoring and assigned responsibilities.
Moreover, municipality plans to expand the boundaries and include more municipal energy users.
name: Liepaja

action_description: District heating company of Liepaja implemented two fuel switch projects. During the 1st phase they installed 10 MW wood chip boiler in the CHP plant in 2012. During the 2nd phase, Liepaja energija installed wood chip boilers of 30 MW.
name: Liepaja

action_description:
Due to renovation of buildings, significant decrease (around 50%) of energy consumption is achieved.  There are many other benefits of renovation for inhabitants and also municipality in general. Meantime, district heating companies, providing heat to these buildings, have to solve issues related to decreased energy load. 

District heating company of Liepaja “Liepajas energija” appraises efforts of inhabitants to renovate their buildings. Company initiated offering energy users with individual energy sources to connect to the district heating system of the city. In 2015 and 2016 more than 40 new users (residential, public and also commercial buildings) initiated to use the services of the district heating. 

As “Liepajas energija” implemented a fuel switch project just two years ago, currently they can offer to all the new customers RES heat.
name: Liepaja

action_description:
Municipality Ljutomer is awere that the energy audit of a building itself does not bring CO2 reduction, but is the first step in establishing an energy management programme. The audit will produce the data on which such a programme is based in the final result Will be the reduction of costs for energy and in paralell also the reduction CO2 emissions.
In year 2005 Municipality Ljutomer prepared 3 energy audits for 3 public buldings in Ljutomer (Building of Municipality Administration, Primary School Ivan Cankar, Kindergarten Ljutomer)
name: Ljutomer

action_description:
The Municiplity of Ljutomer (26th February 2013) has signed the project on public tender held by the Ministry of Infrastructure and Spatial Planning for co-financing operations for the energy rehabilitation of primary schools, kindergartens, health centers and libraries owned by local communities. The application has been favourably resolved, we acquired a co-funding resources amounting to 97,037.91 €. The Municipality have published the public procurement for selection of contractor in July 2013, the contract with the selected contractor was signed in September 2013. The works were completed in mid-November 2013. 
As part of the investment thermal insulation of facades and roof towards unheated attic was carried out, builders joinery (windows and doors) and existing radiators valves for thermostatic valves were replaced. The value of construction works amounted to 142,471.25 €.
name: Ljutomer

action_description: One of the measures of the Action plan for sustainable energy (Sustainable Energy Action Plan) was that the roof surfaces of buildings owned by the Municipality of Ljutomer would be rented out. In the year 2011 the solar power plants were placed at the facility of elementary schools Mala Nedelja and Strocja vas. In 2012 as well on the roof of the gym at the elementary school Ivan Cankar and Cvetko Golar in Ljutomer. In doing so, we gave students an opportunity to monitor the production of electricity.
name: Ljutomer

action_description: Aderendo agli standard di certificazione EMAS il Comune ha manifestato la volontà di definire una politica ambientale nell’amministrazione del territorio in modo efficace e condiviso. Il sistema di gestione finalizzato alla registrazione EMAS consente il controllo efficace degli aspetti ambientali legati alle attività, ai servizi e ai beni utilizzati che possono interagire con l'ambiente, allo scopo di rendere possibile il miglioramento continuo delle prestazioni ambientali del Comune di Loceri.
name: Loceri

action_description:
Lo scopo dell’azione è di costruire un percorso di sensibilizzazione e corretta conoscenza delle tecnologie rinnovabili a partire dalle scuole. Il percorso è stato formalmente avviato con l’adesione da parte del Comune al progetto “Cento Scuole per l’Ambiente” della Fondazione Sesco Onlus: con la donazione, simbolica e sostanziale, di un impianto fotovoltaico, l’obiettivo ultimo è la sensibilizzazione dei più piccoli.
L’azione prevede la costituzione di un percorso formativo ciclico annuale per tutte le scuole primarie e secondarie a partire dalle materne, con la gestione del processo da parte del Centro di Educazione all’Ambiente e alla Sostenibilità (CEAS).
name: Loceri

action_description: L’azione consiste nell'efficientamento dell'illuminazione pubblica del Comune di Loceri. L'intervento è costituito dalla sostituzione di tutte le lampade a vapori di mercurio con lampade a risparmio energetico SAP e a LED, e di alcune lampade SAP, quando arriveranno a fine vita, con lampade a LED. Per quanto riguarda queste ultime, si interviene in maniera più graduale partendo dalle strade e zone di minore frequentazione. In totale 264 lampade sono interessate nell’intervento.
name: Loceri

action_description: Gli interventi di riqualificazione hanno comportato una riduzione di 205 kilowatt della potenza installata (da 668 a 463 kilowatt: a parità di capacità illuminante grazie alla maggior efficienza dei nuovi impianti ed al corretto orientamento della luce"), una diminuzione di 917.280 kilowattora/anno dei consumi di energia elettrica (passati da 2.982.756 a 2.065.476 kilowattora/anno), un risparmio economico di 166.945 euro (la "bolletta elettrica" annuale del Comune è passata da 542.861 euro a 375.916 euro) ed un taglio di 679 tonnellate delle emissioni in atmosfera di CO2 (passate da 2.209 a 1.530), oltre ad un calo di 172 tonnellate equivalenti di petrolio (da 558 a 386).
name: Lodi

action_description: La campagna è stata realizzata con successo nel biennio 2008-2009 e nell’anno 2012.
name: Lodi

action_description: Tutta l'energia elettrica consumata da uffici e sedi comunali e dagli impianti dell'illuminazione pubblica della città proviene da fonti rinnovabili, grazie al nuovo contratto di fornitura di energia elettrica per il periodo 2014-2016, stipulato con la Acam di La Spezia.
name: Lodi

action_description:

necesario paga gastar el agua precisa y lo óptimo para las zonas verdes, según las condiciones climatológicas
name: Logroño

action_description:
A partir de aguas de pozo o freático se realizarán baldeos con los
camiones cisternas municipales reduciendo así el consumo de agua
potable.

Para llevar a cabo la medida se colocará un grupo de bombeo en el
pozo de agua subterránea existente en le Paseo del Espolón. Este
punto de toma estratégicamente es favorable para los servicios de
limpieza.
name: Logroño

action_description:
En la actualidad la aplicación de elementos de domótica puede facilitar la instalación de la sectorización en reducir el volumen de cableado y generar, desde un interruptor, el encendido o apagado de un punto de luz o varios y, a la vez poder, intercambiar sin generar cambios de cableado.

Una sectorización adecuada de la iluminación puede permitir ahorros de hasta el 30% ya que se dejan de utilizar recursos allí donde realmente no es necesario.
name: Logroño

action_description: Dal database Atlasole risulta che da luglio 2012 al 31 luglio 2013 sono stati installati circa 30 KWp di impianti fotovoltaici.
name: Lomagna

action_description: L’Amministrazione Comunale dal 2005 ha attivato il servizio di “Pedibus” che consiste nell’accompagnamento a scuola a piedi dei bambini delle elementari con la collaborazione di un gruppo di volontari (13 volontari) con funzione di “custodi/sorveglianti”. Il Comune ha coinvolto nel 2014 circa 100 alunni delle scuole elementari (considerando un percorso medio di lunghezza pari a 1 Km), riuscendo a evitare un numero di viaggi giornalieri casa-scuola effettuati in auto pari a circa la metà dei partecipanti al “Pedibus” (si tiene conto del fatto che alcuni bambini già prima non arrivassero a scuola in auto, oppure che viaggiassero insieme ad altri).
name: Lomagna

action_description: Il questionario ai cittadini è stato inviato nel mese di novembre 2013 attraverso gli studenti della scuola primaria. Si sono così raccolte informazioni per il 2012 – 2013 e 2014 relativamente a interventi di efficientamento effettuati sugli usi termici ed elettrici della propria abitazione, nonché sulle modalità di trasporto più utilizzate dai componenti familiari e sull’eventuale acquisto di nuovi veicoli a minore consumo. Il questionario conteneva anche domande rivolte a individuare la propensione dei cittadini ad effettuare interventi di risparmio o modifiche nei mezzi di trasporto, nonché a individuare possibili difficoltà e strumenti atti a superarle che l’Amministrazione pubblica potesse mettere in campo.
name: Lomagna

action_description:
ESCO is een totaalpakket aan energiediensten om de energie-efficiëntie van lokale overheidsgebouwen te bevorderen. Binnen deze energiediensten valt: studie naar en uitvoering van energiebesparingsmaatregelen, en de prefinanciering van deze maatregelen. De verschillende stappen die genomen worden zijn: haalbaarheidsstudie, detailstudie, (voorontwerp, ontwerp, aanbesteding,) uitvoering en prefinanciering (optie). De gemeente bespaart hierdoor niet alleen geld en CO2, ze geeft ook het goede voorbeeld aan haar inwoners. De energiebesparingsmaatregelen worden benaderd vanuit een totaalvisie, gebaseerd op de trias-energetica. Ze beslaan de domeinen HVAC, relighting, gebouwschil, hernieuwbare energie en energiemonitoring.
Voor Cultureel Centrum De Adelberg werd via ESCO een haalbaarheidsstudie en detailstudie opgemaakt. Uitvoering van de energierenovatie is voorzien vanaf midden 2016.
name: Lommel

action_description: De provincie Limburg organiseert een samenaankoop voor de levering van aardgas en elektriciteit voor alle Limburgse gemeentebesturen. In het contract wordt voorzien dat er 100% groene stroom wordt geleverd. Door deel te nemen aan deze samenaankoop kunnen gemeentebesturen aan gunstigere voorwaarden voorzien in de energiebehoefte van hun gemeentebestuur.

action_description:

Met deze 5 nieuwe turbines telt het windpark in Lommel intussen in totaal 13 windturbines.

action_description: Sustitución de lámparas y luminarias (dada la baja eficiencia y toxicidad de algunos de sus componentes) por otras que utilicen tecnología LED o MICROLED. Eliminación de excesos de potencias en lámparas y fluorescencias o similares, mediante la sustitución de los elementos auxiliares arrancadores existentes por driver LED, regulables 1-10 V y/o protocolo DALI. Esta acción se desarrolló en el marco del los Proyectos Integrales de Desarrollo Local y Urbano - CRECE, impulsado por la Diputación de Cádiz y cofinanciado por FEDER.
name: Los Barrios

action_description: Mejora de alumbrado público exterior de varias calles del municipio incluyendo: 1. Renovación de centros de mando en mal estado así como sus elementos interiores; 2. Sustitución de lámparas de mercurio (dada la baja eficiencia y toxicidad de sus componentes) por otras de vapor de sodio de alta presión; 3. Eliminación de excesos de potencias en luminarias mediante la sustitución del balasto existente por uno de tipo electrónico y regulable (más eficiente); y 4. Incorporación de sistema de telegestión y control punto a punto que permita la regulación y el control de la instalación sustituida así como la incorporación a dicho sistema de futuras renovaciones o nuevas instalaciones. Esta acción se desarrolló en el marco del los Proyectos Integrales de Desarrollo Local y Urbano - CRECE, impulsado por la Diputación de Cádiz y cofinanciado por FEDER.
name: Los Barrios

action_description:
L'Amministrazione Comunale, in collaborazione con Val Cavallina Servizi, ha introdotto la raccolta differenziata dei rifiuti al fine di superare il limite minimo del 65% previsto per legge. 
Rispetto a quanto già avveniva, sono stati introdotti:
-bidone blu per la differenziazione di vetro e lattine,
-sacco rosso da 30 litri per la raccolta del secco.
La frazione secca a Lovere prima di questo intervento rappresentava oltre il 40% dei rifiuti, ora rappresenta meno del 15%.

Questo intervento gli ha consentito di ridurre notevolmente i consumi di energia elettrica di questi edifici, garantendo comunque le medesime condizioni di illuminamento degli ambienti e correggendo le situazioni di scarsa luminosità.
